review: It would be an absolutely wonderful product if it worked as advertised. In reality Google Music Play--one of the main apps for which you would consider buying this in the first place--only connects with the bleeding dongle when it feels like it. Every so many tracks you will be presented with a loading screen until hell freezes over, or you decide to reboot the damned thing, whatever happens first.Very disappointed on Google's threshold for product quality.
